General.Name: Wiener Privatbank SE
General.Description: Wiener Privatbank SE provides various financial products and services to family offices, private investors, institutions, and foundations in Austria and internationally. It's private banking services include investment consulting; portfolio management; wealth planning and securities account analysis; securities, forex, and financial instruments trading; storage, safe custody, and physical precious metals trading; bank safe rentals; foreign currency accounts; and credit cards. The company also provides asset management services comprising fund management; portfolio selection and management; selection of funds, securities, and stocks; and securities trading, brokerage, and research services. In addition, it offers service packages for companies related to capital market issues, including exchange listing/IPO; structuring and settlement of bond issues; and paying agent, securities control, and processing services, as well as corporate support actions. Further, the company engages in developing investment solutions related to real estate, such as retirement investment apartments, real estate investment companies, real estate funds and mortgage bonds, real estate development, facility management, and real estate brokerage services. Wiener Privatbank SE was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Vienna, Austria.
